name: Dramatique Mega Lip Pencil
about: What it is: A versatile, easy-to-use matte lip color that unites the performance of a lipstick with the convenience and slim tip of a pencil..Formulation Type: Lipstick, Lip Liner..Benefits: Long-wearing..Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, phthalates, and sulfates SLS & SLES. It is also cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This innovative formula veils lips in intense pigments that transform on contact, saturating lips in opulent bold color that sets to a lush matte finish. The weightless yet long-lasting, the creamy non-drying formula feels luxuriously comfortable. Redefine lip perfection with effortless artistry.
ingredients: Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Caprylyl Methicone, Octyldodecanol, Synthetic Wax, Lauroyl Lysine, Diisostearyl Malate, Phenylpropyldimethylsiloxysilicate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Polyethylene, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax / Cera Carnauba / Cire De Carnauba, Stearyl Heptanoate, Stearyl Caprylate, Propylene Carbonate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Isostearic Acid, Lecithin, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Dicalcium Phosphate (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492), Red 6 (Ci 15850), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Red 7 Lake (Ci 15850).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.For a saturated bold matte lip:.-Prep and exfoliate lips for a smooth base..-Sharpen pencil for a precise edge and outline your desired lip shape..-Fill in lips, starting from the center and gliding outwards for full coverage...For a blurred, soft-focus matte lip: .-Exfoliate lips and apply concealer to neutralize lip tone..-Apply color from the pencil starting at the mouth's center, moving outward..-Softly diffuse edges with a finger or flat shadow brush for a gradient look.

reviews.review_text: For depth of color and smooth application I give this pencil a u201c10,u201d however the color doesnu2019t last long on my lips and the first (and only) time I tried to sharpen it the point broke off until I was down to half a pencil and I even used the Pat McGrath sharpener!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a promotional item from Pat. I chose this color because of the name and shade as I love all shades of purple. This cool purple shade is one that didn't disappoint. I like it a lot and enjoy wearing it in a variety of ways (i.e. matt, with lipgloss, lipliner, lipstick, etc).  I will say that it helps to wear a light lip balm underneath for the protection of your lips. I initially didn't do that, and my lips felt it! lol. I recommend this product and I am looking forward to purchasing more.   Thank you, mother Pat!
